review: Even though the Prime sale was kinda lame, I was able to get this for $24.99. I was probably too excited, but this purchase didn't let me down at all. The interface, ease of use, and content have made me move it up on this year's goto gift for the family member that thinks they have it all. I love it.
author: rodney

review: We usually watch Netflix and amazing prime thru the Wii. I thought we would have a bigger selection with this, but it really isn't any great deal if you have another means to play them. The unit gets extremely hot. I have to unplug it because it scares me. Not thrilled. Plus it buffers more than playing shows thru the Wii or on a laptop. A marketing ploy by Amazon to give discounts on their July black Friday that I fell for. Won't buy anything on their black Friday next time.
